title: In Search of Noah's Ark 1976 - Sunn Classic.mp4
description: IN SEARCH OF NOAH'S ARK Sunn Classic Pictures, 1976 Premiered December 24, 1976 1 hour 35 minutes Narrated by Brad Crandall NTSC 29.97 FPS 4:3 Aspect Ratio Captured at 6 mbps from Vestron VHS in very good condition MPEG converted to MP4 (AVC/HE-AAC) with Nero Recode. This is a bit of an upgrade from the other "In Search of Noah's Ark" I uploaded -- higher bit rate, x264 encoding. It's also considerably larger, so I will keep the other torrent available for those who want the smaller file. This is one of a "tetralogy" of 1970s pseudo-scholarly documentaries I have saved from VHS obsolescence. The others are Chariots of the Gods (1970) https://thepiratebay.org/torrent/19842790/Chariots_Of_The_Gods_1970.mp4 In Search of Historic Jesus (1979) https://thepiratebay.org/torrent/19832803/In_Search_of_Historic_Jesus_1979_-_Sunn_Classic The Late Great Planet Earth (1979) https://thepiratebay.org/torrent/19837444/Late_Great_Planet_Earth_1979.mp4 These are all entertaining, but my favorites are Late Great Planet Earth & In Search of Noah's Ark. Naturally the Jesus movie and the Ancient Astronauts movie get the most seeds, but I'd like to turn that trend around by keeping these other films in circulation. Enjoy!
